instructions: If you re looking at the calendar on your Apple Watch, wake your iPhone, then double-click the Home button to show the App Switcher. (On iPhone X and later, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause to show the App Switcher.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open the Calendar app. Add an event, or change an existing one.
Open the Calendar app on your iPhone. Tap the event. Tap Alert, then choose a different interval.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Calendar.
